name: Dungeon Master (itch) (ukra174)
description: Dungeon Master - super casual action slasher and topdown shooter to play when you are angry. Сarve out the crowds of space aliens caught on your spaceship with extreme ammounts of weapon. The hero of the game "Dungeon master", a space traveler who explores different planets. And suddenly his dangerous flight was interrupted by a alien's meteorite hitting his ship...
